p: Reporting of this RCT is in accordance with the CONSORT 2010 statement.[ 21] The study was conducted in adherence with the principles of good clinical practice (GCP). This investigation was approved by the Institutional Review Board at the Cleveland VA Hospital. All patients provided written informed consent. An incentive was not offered to patients for participating in the study. All authors had access to the study data and have reviewed and approved the final manuscript as submitted (Clinicaltrials.gov registration: NCT02113631).
